channel.title: Next Chapter on Another Year of Books
channel.description: Recent content in Next Chapter on Another Year of Books

item.title: AYOB: The Next Chapter
item.description: For as long as I can remember, I have loved to read. That single sentence started it all in January 2018. With that post, Another Year of Books was born. And now, in January 2022, Another Year of Books has come to, what I consider, its next chapter. One night in October, I was lying in bed, thinking about this blog of mine and decided it was time. Time to take a break, maybe temporarily, maybe permanently.
